remarks: Univariate polynomials form a linear subspace of the set of univariate power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ply1val.1 $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ply1val.2 $e |- S = ( PwSer1 ` R ) $.
ply1bas.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
ply1lss $p |- ( R e. Ring -> U e. ( LSubSp ` S ) ) $.
